discs.description: A somewhat unsettling, cave-themed ambient piece consisting mostly of echoed synthesized ambient sounds, resonating metallic clinks, and quiet wind blowing.
discs.how_to_obtain: Creeper killed by Skeleton/Stray, Dungeon/City/Mansion chests

discs.name: Cat
discs.description: A light, looping melody plays on a soft synth and is joined by a synth percussion beat. A toothlike synth plays a bass line and some harmonies throughout.
discs.how_to_obtain: Creeper killed by Skeleton/Stray, Dungeon/City/Mansion chests

discs.name: Blocks
discs.description: An upbeat chiptune-style piece with a shuffling waltz rhythm.

discs.name: Chirp
discs.description: A retro tune with a sample from the 1970 MATTEL Bossa Nova Style Program Disc playing in the background, along with a vaporwave-like version of Mall.

discs.name: Far
discs.description: A calm, relaxing nature-like melody played on a watery echoing synth, accompanied by other synths playing chords.

discs.name: Mall
discs.description: Serene music played on a kalimba along with other instruments.

discs.name: Mellohi
discs.description: A slow, slightly melancholic waltz with a sample from a mellotron playing in the background.
discs.how_to_obtain: Creeper killed by Skeleton/Stray, Buried Treasure

discs.name: Stal
discs.description: A moderate jazz-like piece played on a piano, saxophone, and double bass, with recorder interludes.

discs.name: Strad
discs.description: A tropical-sounding piece with the main melody being played on a steelpan, accompanied by a layered mix of strings and woodwinds.

discs.name: Ward
discs.description: Starts off with an excerpt from Chopin's Funeral March played on a synth organ, but it is interrupted by vinyl static and switches to an electronic, upbeat tune.
A recording that begins with vinyl static, followed by the sounds of someone walking on or breaking stone blocks, heavy breathing, and rustling.

discs.name: Wait
discs.description: An upbeat remix of 'Minecraft'. It starts out with some quiet synth Latin percussion and some soft synths playing a melody, and then expands into a chiptune-esque song.
discs.how_to_obtain: Creeper killed by Skeleton/Stray, Buried Treasure

discs.name: Otherside
discs.description: Starts off as an uplifting and happy retro-style ostinato in a major key. Upon reaching the second half, the song changes to a minor key and progresses into a darker melody.
A recording that begins with static and a warped noise. It features sounds of a flint and steel, walking, the Warden roaring, and eventual sculk shrieker activation.

discs.name: Pigstep
discs.description: An intense, somewhat hip-hop-style beat beginning with a repeating tuba-like tune and dubstep-style drop, along with more mellow parts reminiscent of a radio.

discs.name: Relic
discs.description: The recording begins with vinyl static and record grain before abruptly bursting out into an upbeat 8-bit tune of low audio quality.

discs.name: Creator
discs.description: The disc begins with a short melodious tune, seemingly played from a music box, until it fades into a music box lever being turned.

discs.name: Creator (Music Box)
discs.description: The disc begins with a music box lever being turned, which leads to a short, melodious version of the Creator music disc.

discs.name: Precipice
discs.description: The music track begins with atmospheric tension, featuring a mix of ambient textures, distant percussion, and a sense of depth.

discs.name: Tears
discs.description: A musical remix of ghast sounds, created by reflecting a fireball back at a Ghast.
discs.how_to_obtain: Ghast killed by its own reflected fireball

discs.name: Lava Chicken
discs.description: A note block remake of 'Steve's Lava Chicken' song from A Minecraft Movie. A villager can also be heard singing.
